General.Name: Wildsky Resources Inc
General.Description: Wildsky Resources Inc. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Africa. The company holds three exploration licenses for niobium-tantalum exploration. The company was formerly known as China Minerals Mining Corporation and changed its name to Wildsky Resources Inc. in August 2018. Wildsky Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6

1.Name: Ms. Ke Feng Yuan B.A., CPA, CGA, CPA
